title: UAE: Sheikh Hamdan inaugurates driverless RT6 taxi operations in Dubai
summary_full: Dubai has officially begun testing fully autonomous RT6 taxis on public roads, a significant stride in integrating AI into its transport system. Crown Prince Sheikh Hamdan bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum experienced a ride, showcasing the technology's readiness. This paves the way for a public launch in early 2026, with plans for over 1,000 vehicles.
